title: Canon PIXMA E510 3-in-1 Print/Copy/Scan
summary: The PIXMA Ink Efficient E510Built to give you an affordable printing experience. Besides print, copy and scan functionalities, the PIXMA E510 also offer innovative printing opportunities from My Image Garden software to dramatize your photos.ISO standard print speed (A4): up to 8.6ipm mono / 5.0ipm colourPrint, scan, copyPrints a 4 x 6" borderless photo in 44secs.
